title: How to Make a Black Beans Appetizer

steps.headline: Pound salted beans and set aside.
Pound garlic, Bombay onion and hot pepper.
Pour in oil in a heated non-stick frying pan.
Add in all pounded ingredients except the black beans.
Add in pound black bean , stir until it fragrances, pour in tamarind juice and cover with lid.
Cook on slow fire for 10 minutes.
Stir gradually until the oil is raised.
Let it cool before storing it in glass container.

text: Pound salted beans and set aside.  Pound garlic, Bombay onion and hot pepper. Set aside. Pour in oil in a heated non-stick frying pan.  Add in all pounded ingredients except the black beans. Stir until fragrance. Add in pound black bean , stir until it fragrances, pour in tamarind juice and cover with lid.  Cook on slow fire for 10 minutes.  Add in sugar,mushroom seasoning/MSG (optional).  Stir gradually until the oil is raised.  Let it cool before storing it in glass container.
